Moviequizz : Class and methods description¶

class moviequizz.Moviequizz(token='xoxb-38180923028-yicicwnozv4rbBvLBVvSiuyx')[source]¶

Bot main class.

connect()[source]¶

Connects the bot to Slack

error(channel_id, user_infos, user_id, team_id)[source]¶
Shows the error message to the channel, in case of bad input
Parameters:
  • channel_id – id of channel
  • user_infos – the receiver
  • team_id – team id
help(channel_id, user_infos, user_id, team_id)[source]¶
Shows help and commands for the moviequizz bot.
Parameters:
  • channel_id – id of channel
  • user_infos – the receiver
  • team_id – team id
process(message)[source]¶
Processes input messages.
Parameters:
  • channel_id – id of channel
  • user_infos – the receiver
  • team_id – team id
question(channel_id, user_infos, user_id, team_id)[source]¶
Asks a question and add it to the currentAskedQuestions
Parameters:
  • message – the sent message
  • channel_id – id of channel
  • user_infos – the receiver
  • team_id – team id
rank(channel_id, user_infos, user_id, team_id)[source]¶
Shows the rank and score of the current playing user
Parameters:
  • channel_id – id of channel
  • user_infos – the receiver
  • user_id – user id
  • team_id – team id
ranking(channel_id, user_infos, user_id, team_id)[source]¶
Shows the top 10 ranking list with the best players ever.
Parameters:
  • channel_id – id of channel
  • user_infos – the receiver
  • team_id – team id
reponse(user_id, answeredQuestionId, channel_id, user_infos, team_id)[source]¶
Tests if the player answer is correct. Called when the bot receive an answer. Add points to ranking when correct and display a message (failure or success).
Parameters:
  • user_id – user id
  • answeredQuestionId – the answered id from the user
  • channel_id – id of channel
  • user_infos – the receiver
  • team_id – team id
sendText(message, channel_id, user_infos, team_id)[source]¶
Sends a message to the user.
Parameters:
  • message – the sent message
  • channel_id – id of channel
  • user_infos – the receiver
  • team_id – team id
